children.text:
![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-b3ec40b1-c5ac-4def-b8ce-dcf6885a37fe.png)
[And all the audio files, so your Words and Pictures book is ready to play.

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-9c4abff4-5821-47f2-883b-0f958bab1426.png) 
[Run the code again with this file as a parameter.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-c2197a17-7135-4edd-bb6d-124932ce547c.png) 
[Paste in your browser, then right click to save the results.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-c178c289-2b9f-4302-81bc-5a56be4c224b.png)
[Save them in the same folder as your Python code.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-33bce452-4f70-4067-912a-dbffb9e050d6.png)
[Run python with the Coggle address as a parameter. Copy the generated API address.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-185cd5f1-8260-4e6c-8529-5aa5d8974753.png) 
[When your Coggle is complete, copy the web address.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-e01e042d-53b7-4947-8f56-fd982bfc11a5.png)
[Use square brackets to keep text together in a block.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-774e1ced-da24-420f-ade9-2961d9a07c29.png)
[Images uploaded to Coggle are stored with Amazon.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-83207996-77e0-4c1e-a613-c0ce0031ca2c.png)
[You can also enter the web address of some other image to include.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-016cbf85-5ce4-436e-8fc2-b4cb29116ed9.png)
[Specify the voice or language to the left of your main node.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-91471916-4118-4331-bcf3-5be87f99f1e2.png)
[Use Coggle to create your Words and Pictures book.]

![uploaded image](https://coggle-images.s3.amazonaws.com/553c9677f199f5492994bf52-d8a940db-8507-4ec9-b629-88ffd86df608.png)
[Add images to the right in your Coggle with drag and drop.]
